review:
A friend of mine bought me this game as a joke and told me to play it, let me tell you, playing it might have been the worst gaming expierience I've ever had in my life.

All 21 minutes that I played physically hurt me and still brings traumatic flashbacks to this day. You might think I'm joking, but I kid you not this game was GOD AWFUL.

The gameplay consists of the player moving right and left, jumping, and dodging obstacles somewhat repetitively. This is literally all the gameplay is. The characters also have swords and shields but they can't be used so what's the point?
Not to mention the graphics in the game remind me of cardboard cutouts and makes the game even less appealing. 

All in all this game is terrible and the fifty cents my friend used to buy this would've been better use to me if he just stuck two quarters down my throat.
